column4: probably a common question, does the windows installer for 12.04 do 32bit or 64bit
i'd highly recommed you consider "dual booting" over using Wubi.  but YMMV.
sorry, i didn't think you'd installed already.
so how are you planning to install?  cd/usb?  if you boot the media it will allow you to setup a dual-boot quite easily.
